name: mcp-server-appsignal
description: MCP server for AppSignal application performance monitoring and error tracking
author: PulseMCP

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd local && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.build: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../local && npm run build
scripts.build:test: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../local && npm run build && cd ../../../test-mcp-client && npm run build
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:test && vitest run -c vitest.config.integration.ts && npm run clean
scripts.test:all: npm run test:run && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:manual: npm run build:test && vitest run -c vitest.config.manual.ts
